alert.note: Alert for Mojave Desert Slopes (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 12 at 1:36AM PDT until June 13 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Mojave Desert Slopes. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 11 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include, but are not limited to Highway 14, Highway 178 through and below Walker Pass, and Highway 58 through and below the Tehachapi Pass, including the town of Mojave.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
